attributes.additional_details:
Maltby Manor Primary School is in desperate need of a breakfast & after school club!. So many parents are struggling to work long hours or work at all as no childminders drop off or pick up from this school
Childcare is a major problem for parents at maltby primary school, A breakfast & afterschool club would help an enormous amount of parents. I have spoke to several parents who are disscussing removing their children to other schools in maltby just because they provide afterschool clubs, Myself being one of theese parents. We need you to provide a service for working parents to use.
